Contributor: Partridge, Bernard, b. 1861, artist.; David Allen & Sons, printer.; Great Britain. Parliamentary Recruiting Committee publisher.;
Note: Signed "B.P.," i.e., Bernard Partridge. "Poster No. 106" "W.3311.20M-6/15" appears on the bottom right of the poster. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: A recruiting poster.  Justice extends a (scabbarded) sword toward the viewer, as the Lusitania sinks in the background.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.

Title: Take up the sword of justice
